plot: LordKat walks viewers through classic video games, providing helpful tips and amusing anecdotes to help them overcome unspeakable difficulty and frustrating obstacles that stand between them and victory, and he won't stop... until we win.
plot_en: LordKat walks viewers through classic video games, providing helpful tips and amusing anecdotes to help them overcome unspeakable difficulty and frustrating obstacles that stand between them and victory, and he won't stop... until we win.
plot_es: LordKat walks viewers through classic video games, providing helpful tips and amusing anecdotes to help them overcome unspeakable difficulty and frustrating obstacles that stand between them and victory, and he won't stop... until we win.
title: Until We Win
